sentences.en: A car suddenly mounted the pavement to avoid a vehicle coming in the opposite direction.
sentences.cn: 有辆汽车为了躲避迎面驶来的一辆车，突然冲上了人行道。

sentences.en: A third presidential candidate emerged to mount a serious challenge and throw the campaign wide open.
sentences.cn: 第三位总统候选人的杀出对前两位构成了严峻挑战，并使得选举形势扑朔迷离。

sentences.en: Casualties on both sides of the battle have continued to mount.
sentences.cn: 交战双方的伤亡人数继续增加。

sentences.en: He mounted his horse and rode on.
sentences.cn: 他跨上马前行。

sentences.en: He mounted the stairs and looked around him slowly.
sentences.cn: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.en: He was the first to mount the breach in the city wall.
sentences.cn: 他首先登上城墙豁口.

sentences.en: Her husband mounts the work on velour paper and makes the frame.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫把作品装裱到丝绒纸上，又做了框架。

sentences.en: I am appalled that children can mount up debts unbeknown to their parents.
sentences.cn: 让我深感震惊的是，孩子们竟会背着父母欠债累累。

sentences.en: I'll mount guard over the luggage while you get the ticket.
sentences.cn: 你去买票,我来看管行李.

sentences.en: If you hide away your problems and pretend that they don't exist they will just continue to mount up.
sentences.cn: 如果你把问题藏起来，假装它们不存在，问题只会越积越多。

sentences.en: In 1981, five members of a climbing party died while scaling Mount Hood.
sentences.cn: 1981年，一支登山队的5名队员在攀登胡德峰时遇难。

sentences.en: It'll cost a great deal of money to mount the play.
sentences.cn: 要上演这场戏得花很多钱.

sentences.en: Larry was mounting the stairs up into the attic.
sentences.cn: 拉里正在拾级而上到阁楼去。

sentences.en: Mount Marcy is the highest mountain in the Adirondacks.
sentences.cn: 马西山是阿迪朗达克山脉中最高的山。

sentences.en: Mount Qomolangma
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰

sentences.en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentences.cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentences.en: Tension here is mounting , as we await the final result.
sentences.cn: 我们等待着最终结果，这里的气氛也越来越紧张。

sentences.en: the first ascent of Mount Everest
sentences.cn: 首次攀登珠穆朗玛峰

sentences.en: The National Gallery mounted an exhibition of Danish painting.
sentences.cn: 国家美术馆举办了丹麦画展。

sentences.en: The question of going to the Mount Tai preoccupied his mind.
sentences.cn: 去游泰山的问题盘踞在他心头.

sentences.en: The top of Mount Everest is the most inaccessible place in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最难到达的地方.

sentences.en: Though death befalls all men alike , it may be weightier than Mount Tai or lighter than a feather.
sentences.cn: 人固有一死, 或重于泰山,或轻于鸿毛.

sentences.en: Viewed from the top of Mount Tai , the sunrise was indeed a spectacle.
sentences.cn: 从泰山顶上看去, 日出真是个奇观.

sentences.en: When people work with one mind , they can even remove Mount Taishan.
sentences.cn: 人心齐, 泰山移.

安装（mount的过去式和过去分词）；爬上；骑上

trans.tran_en: to get on a horse or bicycle
